import React, {useState} from "react"; import {Button} from "react-bootstrap"; import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './Register.scss'; import FormInput from "../FormInput"; const Register = (props) => { const [registerForm, setRegisterForm] = useState({}); const handleChange = (e, type) => { const {value} = e.target setRegisterForm((prevForm) => ({ ...prevForm, [type]: value, })) } console.log('========>registerForm', registerForm); return (
